content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Mallorca 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Mallorca 1.
Attempt missed. Dejan Lekic (Mallorca) with an attempt from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Diogo Salomão with a cross.
